body:
2014 has been a petrifying year for me... Lots of weird stuff happened...... But  the most petrifying was only last week.... nearly drowned X_X but im so exited for Christmas!                  IM GETTING: Mariokart 7 (Maybe)
New super mario bros 2 (Maybe)
Goldfish (Yes)
Thats all i know but.. Today ill be on the walls...  Cya... :P
